themeInformation.title: Social
themeInformation.description: This is the 'Social' group theme and inherits styles from the 'Social' site theme

scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Groups_GroupBanner_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($userId = $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id) #set ($group = $core_v2_group.Current) #set ($groupType = $core_v2_group.Current.GroupType) #set ($isRegistered = $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) #set ($membershipType = "None") #set ($groupUser = $core_v2_groupUserMember.Get($group.Id, "%{UserId = $userId}")) #set ($membershipType = $groupUser.MembershipType) #set ($canLeaveGroup = ($groupUser.IsDirectMember && !$groupUser.IsRoleMember) && ($membershipType != "Owner" || $core_v2_groupUserMember.List($group.Id, "%{MembershipType = 'Owner', PageSize = 1}").TotalCount > 1)) #set ($canJoinGroup = $core_v2_nodePermission.Get("groups", $group.Id, "Group_JoinGroup").IsAllowed) #set ($canJoinGroupByRequest = $core_v2_nodePermission.Get("groups", $group.Id, "Group_JoinGroupByRequest").IsAllowed) #set ($application = false) #set ($application = $core_v2_application.Current) ## get current non container/app content #set ($content = false) #set ($content = $core_v2_content.Current) #set ($contentName = false) #if ($content && ($application && $content.ContentId == $application.ApplicationId) || ($group && $content.ContentId == $group.ContainerId) || $content.Errors.Count > 0) #set ($content = false) #set ($contentName = false) #elseif ($content) #set ($contentName = $content.HtmlName('Web')) #end #set ($withAlert = false) #if (!$isRegistered && ($groupType == "PublicOpen" || $groupType == "PublicClosed")) #set ($withAlert = true) #elseif ($groupType != "Joinless" && $membershipType == "None" && ($canJoinGroup || $canJoinGroupByRequest)) #set ($withAlert = true) #end #set ($isHome = false) #if ($core_v2_groupUrls.Current == 'Group') #set($isHome = true) #end #set ($applications = $core_v2_customNavigation.Deserialize($group.Id, $core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue('navigation', ''))) #set ($name = $group.Name) #set ($description = "") #if ($application) #set ($description = $application.HtmlName('')) #elseif (!$isHome) #foreach($app in $applications) #if ($app.IsSelected) #set ($description = $!app.Label) #end #end #end #if ($isHome) #set ($nameTruncationLength = 40) #set ($descriptionTruncationLength = 0) #else #set ($nameTruncationLength = 15) #set ($descriptionTruncationLength = 25) #end #set ($truncatedName = $core_v2_language.Truncate($name, $nameTruncationLength, "…")) #set ($truncatedDescription = $core_v2_language.Truncate($description, $descriptionTruncationLength, "…")) #set ($truncatedContentName = $core_v2_language.Truncate($contentName, $descriptionTruncationLength, "…"))
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($core_v2_group.Current.AvatarUrl, 68, 68, "%{ alt = $group.Name, ResizeMethod='ZoomAndCrop' }")
#set ($includeParent = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('includeParent', true)) #set ($rootGroup = $core_v2_group.Root) #if ($includeParent && $group.Id != $rootGroup.Id) #set ($currentGroupPath = $core_v2_group.CurrentGroupPath) #set ($pathIndex = $currentGroupPath.Count) #set ($parentGroupName = false) #set ($parentGroup = false) #set ($depth = 0) #if ($currentGroupPath.count > 2) #foreach ($pathGroup in $currentGroupPath) #beforeall
    #each #set ($depth = $depth + 1) #if ($group.Id != $pathGroup.Id) #set ($parentGroup = $pathGroup) #end

#end #end #if ($isHome)

$truncatedName

#else
$truncatedName
#end #if ($application) #if (!$content && $core_v2_urls.FullPath($core_v2_page.Url) == $core_v2_urls.FullPath($application.Url))

$truncatedDescription

#else $truncatedDescription #end #if ($content) $truncatedContentName #end #end #end #end #foreach($app in $applications) #beforeall

scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Groups_GroupBanner_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="navigation" dataType="custom" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.CustomNavigationCustomControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" maximumDepth="1" resourceName="Groups_GroupApplicationNavigation_Navigation" descriptionResourceName="Groups_GroupApplicationNavigation_Navigation_Description" navigationType="group" scope="group" /> <property id="includeParent" dataType="bool" defaultValue="True" resourceName="Groups_GroupApplicationNavigation_IncludeParent" descriptionResourceName="Groups_GroupApplicationNavigation_IncludeParent_Description" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Displays a banner of common group information and links.
Edit this group and add a description
This group requires membership for participation - click to join
There was an error joining or leaving the group.
Add, edit, delete, and reorder navigation items for this group.
Groups are areas of interest within your community where people can share and collaborate together. Some groups are public while others are private.
When enabled, parent groups can be navigated to from the current group

scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blogs_BlogTitle_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($page = $core_v2_blogUrls.Current) #if($page == 'BlogPost') #set($postTitle = false) #set($postTitle = $core_v2_blogPost.Current.MetaTitle) #if(!$postTitle || $postTitle == '') #set($postTitle = $core_v2_blogPost.Current.Title) #end #set($title = $postTitle) #elseif ($page == 'UserBlogs') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_BlogTitle_UsersBlogPosts'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'AddBlog') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('CF_CreateBlog')) #elseif ($page == 'Day') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatDate($core_v2_utility.ParseDate($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('y'), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('m'), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('d')))) #elseif ($page == 'Month') #set($title = $core_v2_utility.ParseDate( $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue("y"), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue("m"), $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('d')).ToString('MMMM, yyyy')) #elseif ($page == 'Bloggers') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Blog_Breadcrumbs_Bloggers')) #elseif ($page == 'Contact') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Contact')) #elseif ($page == 'About') #set($title = $core_v2_blog.Current.AboutTitle) #elseif ($page == 'LinkList') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Weblog_Link_Links')) #elseif ($page == 'Tags') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('TagBrowser_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Search') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Search')) #elseif ($page == 'CustomPage') #set($title = $core_v2_customPage.Current.Title) #end #if ($page == 'Blog') $core_v2_page.SetTitle('', true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$core_v2_blog.Current.Name

#end #elseif ($title) $core_v2_page.SetTitle($title, true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$title

#end #else $core_v2_page.SetTitle($core_v2_language.GetResource('Core_ApplicationNavigation_Blogs'), true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Core_ApplicationNavigation_Blogs')

#end #end

scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blogs_BlogPostList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($showSidebarList = false) #set ($region = $core_v2_widget.RegionName.ToLower()) #set ($layout = $core_v2_page.Layout.ToLower())
#if ($region == 'split-sidebar-left' || $region == 'split-sidebar-right' || $region == 'left-sidebar') #set ($showSidebarList = true) #elseif ($region == 'right-sidebar' && !$layout.Contains('split-content') && !$layout.Contains('split-sidebar')) #set ($showSidebarList = true) #end
#if ($showSidebarList) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('simplelist.vm') #else #if ($core_v2_blog.Current) #if (!$core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) #set ($sub = $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('sub')) #if ($sub) #set ($msg = false) #if ($sub.ToLower() == "true") #set ($msg = $core_v2_language.GetResource("Weblog_Subscription_SuccessMessage")) #elseif ($sub.ToLower() == "false") #set ($msg = $core_v2_language.GetResource("Weblog_Unsubscription_SuccessMessage")) #end #if ($msg) #registerEndOfPageHtml() <script type="text/javascript"> jQuery(function(j){ j.telligent.evolution.notifications.show('$msg', {type: 'success', duration: 10000}); }); </script> #end #end #end #end #end $core_v2_ui.PagedContent('list.vm') #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Blogs_BlogPostList_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="viewDetail" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_ViewDetail" dataType="string" defaultValue="list"> <propertyValue value="list" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_ListView" /> <propertyValue value="detail" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_DetailView" /> </property> <property id="postSortBy" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_PostSortBy" dataType="string" defaultValue="MostRecent"> <propertyValue value="MostRecent" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_PostSortBy_MostRecent" /> <propertyValue value="MostViewed" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_PostSortBy_MostViewed" /> <propertyValue value="MostComments" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_PostSortBy_MostComments" /> </property> <property id="userQueryType" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_UserQueryType" dataType="string" defaultValue="all"> <propertyValue value="all" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_UserQueryType_All" /> <propertyValue value="accessingUser" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_UserQueryType_Accessing" /> <propertyValue value="currentUser" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_UserQueryType_Current" /> </property> <property id="selectedBlogOrGroup" resourceName="CF_Blog_SelectGroupAndBlog" dataType="custom" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Blogs.Controls.BlogSelectionControl, Telligent.Evolution.Blogs" width="95%" /> <property id="tagsToFilter" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_TagsToFilter" dataType="string" /> <property id="excerptSize" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_ExcerptSize" dataType="int" defaultValue="420" descriptionResourceName="CF_BlogPostList_ExcerptSize_Description"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" minValue="1" maxValue="10000" /> </property> <property id="pageSize" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_PageSize" dataType="int" defaultValue="25"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" minValue="1" maxValue="100" /> </property> <property id="displayPostImage" resourceName="CF_BlogPostList_DisplayPostImage" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Displays a list of blog posts.
Select group/blog to pull content from
Enter the maximum number of characters to display for post excerpts.
There are no blog posts to show. This could be because there are no posts in this blog or due to a filter.
Thanks for subscribing, you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
You're already subscribed, please check your email for a confirmation email.
You will receive email notifications when this blog is updated.
You have successfully subscribed to receive email updates for this blog.
You have successfully unsubscribed from updates for this blog.

language.resource: Displays the form used to email blog owners.
Your contact request has been sent successfully.
To enable this widget, you must edit this blog's settings, enable the "Email Blog Author" form, and enter an e-mail address.

defaultValue="${resource:MoreContent_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="moreType" resourceName="type" resourceName="Related" propertiesToShow="groups,includeSubGroups,includeBlogPost,includeWikiPage,includeMedia,includeForumThread,includeGroup" /> <propertyValue value="recommended" resourceName="Recommended" propertiesToShow="groups,includeSubGroups,includeBlogPost,includeWikiPage,includeMedia,includeForumThread,includeGroup" /> <propertyValue value="users" resourceName="Users" propertiesToHide="groups,includeSubGroups,includeBlogPost,includeWikiPage,includeMedia,includeForumThread,includeGroup" /> </property> <property id="display" resourceName="display" descriptionResourceName="display_description" dataType="string" defaultValue="as-list" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyVisibilityValueSelectionControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls"> <propertyValue value="as-list" resourceName="list" propertiesToShow="pageSize" propertiesToHide="slideAt" /> <propertyValue value="as-slider" resourceName="slider" propertiesToShow="slideAt" propertiesToHide="pageSize" /> </property> <property id="slideAt" resourceName="slideAt" descriptionResourceName="sildeAt_description" dataType="string" defaultValue="bottom"> <propertyValue value="middle" resourceName="middle" /> <propertyValue value="bottom" resourceName="bottom" /> </property> <property id="includeBlogPost" dataType="bool" resourceName="includeBlogPost" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="includeWikiPage" dataType="bool" resourceName="includeWikiPage" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="includeMedia" dataType="bool" resourceName="includeMedia" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="includeForumThread" dataType="bool" resourceName="includeForumThread" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="includeGroup" dataType="bool" Telligent.Evolution.Controls" includeCurrentGroup="True" defaultValue="Group=-1" /> <property id="includeSubGroups" resourceName="includeSubGroups" dataType="bool" defaultValue="true" /> <property id="pageSize" resourceName="pageSize" dataType="int" defaultValue="5"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" minValue="1" maxValue="100" /> </property> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Suggests related or recommended content the accessing user may be interested in.
By selecting 'slider', suggestions will be shown in a popup that slides in when the page is scrolled. On narrow targets, 'list' is used even if 'slider' is selected.
Selects at roughly which scroll position the suggestions should reveal

scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blogs_BlogPost_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($post = false) #set($post = $core_v2_blogPost.Current) #if(!$post) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set ($accessingUserIsRegistered = $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) $core_v2_blogPost.IncrementViewCount($post.Id) #set ($hasAttachment = false) #set ($hasAttachment = $post.File && $post.File.FileUrl) #set ($mediaType = false) #set ($mediaRendered = false) #if ($hasAttachment) #set ($mediaType = $core_v2_ui.GetMediaType($post.File.FileUrl, "%{ ViewType = 'View' }")) #end #if(!$post.IsApproved)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('DraftPost')
#elseif($post.PublishedDate > $core_v2_utility.CurrentDate())
$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('FuturePost'), $core_v2_language.FormatDateAndTime($post.PublishedDate))
#end

$post.Title

## audio/video #if ($hasAttachment && ($mediaType == 'Video' || $mediaType == 'Audio'))
$core_v2_ui.GetViewHtml($post.File.FileUrl, "%{ AdjustToContainer = 'true' }")
$post.File.FileName
#set ($mediaRendered = true) #end
$post.Body("Web")
## viewable non audio/video #if (!$mediaRendered && $hasAttachment && $mediaType && $mediaType != 'Empty')
  • $post.File.FileName
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('view')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('hide')
$core_v2_ui.GetViewHtml($post.File.FileUrl, "%{ AdjustToContainer = 'true' }")
#registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #set ($mediaRendered = true) #end ## non-viewable #if (!$mediaRendered && $hasAttachment && !$mediaType || $mediaType == 'Empty') $post.File.FileName #set ($mediaRendered = true) #end

scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:CommentForm_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
## hide if no content #set ($content = $core_v2_content.Current) #if (!$content) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end ## hide if comments not supported #if (!$core_v2_comments.SupportsComments($content.ContentTypeId)) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end ## check if user is anonymous #set($isAnonymous = true) #if ($core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id)) #set($isAnonymous = false) #end ## check if comments are not allowed #set($allowsComments = false) #if ($core_v2_comments.AllowsComments($content.ContentId, $content.ContentTypeId)) #set($allowsComments = true) #end ## check if user can comment #if ($core_v2_comments.CanCreateComment($content.ContentId, $content.ContentTypeId)) #set($commentPostId = "$core_v2_widget.UniqueId('save')") #elseif ($isAnonymous && $allowsComments) #set($commentPostId = "$core_v2_widget.UniqueId('login')") #else $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end ## support comment count threshholds when configured with a non-zero value #set ($displayCommentThreshold = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue('displayCommentThreshold', 0)) #set ($currentComments= $core_v2_comments.List("%{ ContentId = $content.ContentId, ContentTypeId = $content.ContentTypeId, PageSize = 1, PageIndex = 0 }")) #set ($currentCommentCount = 0) #set ($currentCommentCount = $currentComments.TotalCount) #if ($displayCommentThreshold != 0 && $currentCommentCount < $displayCommentThreshold) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($tempBody = "") #set($tempKey = $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue("tempkey")) #if ($tempKey) #set($tempBody = $core_v2_utility.GetTemporaryData($tempKey)) #end
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Comment_Post')
#set($returnUrl = $core_v2_urls.Current) #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.commentForm') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end

scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($content = false) #set ($content = $core_v2_content.Current) #if (!$content) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end
$core_v2_ui.PagedContent('load.vm')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.comments') <script type="text/javascript" src="$core_v2_encoding.HtmlAttributeEncode($core_v2_widget.GetFileUrl('ui.js'))"></script> #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() <script type="text/javascript"> jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery.telligent.evolution.widgets.comments.register({ wrapper:jQuery('#$core_v2_ui.PagedContentWrapperElementId'), errorText:'$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('CommentList_Error'))', loadingText:'$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('CommentList_Loading'))', loadCommentsUrl:'$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('load.vm'))', deleteVerificationText:'$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource("Comment_DeleteVerify"))', baseUrl:'$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_page.Url)', contentTypeId: '$content.ContentTypeId', contentId: '$content.ContentId', pagedMessage: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_ui.PagedContentPagedEvent)', pageIndexQueryStringKey: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_ui.PageIndexQueryStringKey)', editCommentUrl : '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_page.AdjustQueryString($core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl("editComment.vm"), "CommentID={0}"))', editTitle: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('Modal_Title'))' }); }); </script> #end

scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Core_TagCloud_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($applicationType = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('applicationType', 'Unknown')) #set ($filterTags = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('filterTags','')) #set ($ignoreFilterTags = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('ignoreFilterTags', false)) #set ($maximumTags = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue('maximumTags', 25)) #set ($minimumPostsPerTag = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue('minimumPostsPerTag', 1)) #set ($showTagCounts = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('showTagCounts',false)) #set ($enableNoTagsMessage = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('enableNoTagsMessage',false)) #set ($noTagsText = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('noTagsText','${resource:TagCloud_NoTagsDefined}')) #set ($linkTo = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('linkTo','ContextualTagBrowser')) #set ($cssClasses = $core_v2_utility.MakeList('level-6','level-5','level-4','level-3','level-2','level-1')) #set ($currentTags = $core_v2_tags.Current) ## build base tag query #set ($query = "%{PageSize=100,PageIndex=0,SortBy='ContentCount',SortOrder='Descending'}") #set ($linkQuery = "%{}") #set ($showBreadCrumbs = false) #if (!$ignoreFilterTags) #if($filterTags.Length == 0 && $currentTags && $currentTags.Count > 0) #set ($filterTags = $core_v2_utility.Join(',',$currentTags)) #set($showBreadCrumbs = true) #end #if ($filterTags && $filterTags.Length > 0) $query.Add('Tags', $filterTags) #end #end #if ($core_v2_container.Current) ##if widget is on the site home page (on the root group page) then retrieve all tags #if ($core_v2_container.Current.ContainerId != $core_v2_group.Root.ContainerId) $query.Add('ContainerIds', $core_v2_container.Current.ContainerId) #end $linkQuery.Add('ContainerId', $core_v2_container.Current.ContainerId) $linkQuery.Add('ContainerTypeId', $core_v2_container.Current.ContainerTypeId) #end ## load tags #set ($tags = false) #set ($urlGenerator = false) #if ($applicationType == "Forum") #set ($currentForum = $core_v2_forum.Current) $query.Add('ApplicationTypeIds', $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationTypeId', $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId) #if ($currentForum) $query.Add('ApplicationIds', $currentForum.ApplicationId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationId', $currentForum.ApplicationId) #end #elseif ($applicationType == "Weblog") #set ($currentBlog = $core_v2_blog.Current) $query.Add('ApplicationTypeIds', $core_v2_blog.ApplicationTypeId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationTypeId', $core_v2_blog.ApplicationTypeId) #if ($currentBlog) $query.Add('ApplicationIds', $currentBlog.ApplicationId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationId', $currentBlog.ApplicationId) #end #elseif ($applicationType == "MediaGallery") #set ($currentGallery = $core_v2_gallery.Current) $query.Add('ApplicationTypeIds', $core_v2_gallery.ApplicationTypeId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationTypeId', $core_v2_gallery.ApplicationTypeId) #if ($currentGallery) $query.Add('ApplicationIds', $currentGallery.ApplicationId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationId', $currentGallery.ApplicationId) #end #elseif ($applicationType == "Wiki") #set ($currentWiki = $core_v2_wiki.Current) $query.Add('ApplicationTypeIds', $core_v2_wiki.ApplicationTypeId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationTypeId', $core_v2_wiki.ApplicationTypeId) #if ($currentWiki) $query.Add('ApplicationIds', $currentWiki.ApplicationId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationId', $currentWiki.ApplicationId) #end #elseif ($applicationType == "Unknown") #if($core_v2_application.Current) $query.Add('ApplicationIds', $core_v2_application.Current.ApplicationId) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationId', $core_v2_application.Current.ApplicationId) #end #if ($core_v2_applicationType.Current) $query.Add('ApplicationTypeIds', $core_v2_applicationType.Current.Id) $linkQuery.Add('ApplicationTypeId', $core_v2_applicationType.Current.Id) #end #end #if ($showBreadCrumbs) #if($core_v2_tags.Current && $core_v2_tags.Current.Count > 0)
    $linkQuery.Remove('Tags') #set($tagUrl = false) #set($tagUrl = $core_v2_urls.Tags($linkQuery)) #if ($tagUrl)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('AllTags')
    • #end #set($index = 0) #foreach($tag in $core_v2_tags.Current) #each #set($index = $index + 1) $linkQuery.Remove('Tags') $linkQuery.Add('Tags', $core_v2_utility.Join(',', $core_v2_utility.Slice($core_v2_tags.Current, 0, $index))) #set($tagUrl = false) #set($tagUrl = $core_v2_urls.Tags($linkQuery)) #if ($tagUrl)
  • $tag
    • #end #end
#end #end #set ($tags = $core_v2_tags.List($query)) #set ($sortedTags = $core_v2_tags.Sort($tags, "%{ MinimumItemsPerTag = $minimumPostsPerTag, MaximumNumberOfTags = $maximumTags, CssClasses = $cssClasses }")) #foreach ($tag in $sortedTags) #beforeall
    #each #set ($tagName = $tag.Name) #if ($showTagCounts) #set ($tagName = "${tagName} ($tag.ContentCount)") #end
  • #set ($tagUrl = false) #if($linkTo != 'Nothing') #set ($tagsToLink = false) #set ($tagsToLink = $core_v2_tags.Current) #if ($tagsToLink) #set ($addIndex = $tagsToLink.Add($tag.Name)) #else #set ($tagsToLink = $core_v2_utility.MakeList($tag.Name)) #end #if($linkTo == 'SiteTagBrowser') #set($tagUrl = $core_v2_urls.Tags($tagsToLink)) #else $linkQuery.Remove('Tags') $linkQuery.Add('Tags', $core_v2_utility.Join(',', $tagsToLink)) #set($tagUrl = $core_v2_urls.Tags($linkQuery)) #end #end #if ($tagUrl) $tagName #else $tagName #end
    • #afterall
#nodata #if ($filterTags && $filterTags.Length > 0)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('TagCloud_NoSubTagsDefined')
#elseif($noTagsText && $enableNoTagsMessage) #set ($noTagsText = $core_v2_widget.ApplyTokens($noTagsText))
$noTagsText
#else $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:TagCloud_Title}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="applicationType" resourceName="CF_AppType" dataType="string" defaultValue="Unknown"> <propertyValue value="Forum" resourceName="CF_Forum" /> <propertyValue value="Weblog" resourceName="CF_Weblog" /> <propertyValue value="MediaGallery" resourceName="CF_MediaGallery" /> <propertyValue value="Wiki" resourceName="CF_Wiki" /> <propertyValue value="Unknown" resourceName="CF_Unknown" /> </property> <property id="ignoreFilterTags" resourceName="CF_IgnoreFilterTags" descriptionResourceName="CF_IgnoreFilterTags_Description" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> <property id="maximumTags" resourceName="CF_MaxTags" descriptionResourceName="CF_MaxTags_Description" dataType="int" defaultValue="25"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" minValue="1" maxValue="100" /> </property> <property id="minimumPostsPerTag" resourceName="CF_MinPostsPerTag" descriptionResourceName="CF_MinPostsPerTag_Description" dataType="int" defaultValue="1"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" minValue="1" maxValue="10000" /> </property> <property id="filterTags" resourceName="CF_TagsToFilter" descriptionResourceName="CF_TagsToFilter_Description" dataType="string" defaultValue="" /> <property id="showTagCounts" resourceName="CF_ShowTagCount" descriptionResourceName="CF_ShowTagCount_Description" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> <property id="enableNoTagsMessage" resourceName="CF_EnableNoTagsMessage" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> <property id="noTagsText" resourceName="CF_NoTagsText" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:TagCloud_NoTagsDefined}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="linkTo" resourceName="CF_LinkTagsTo" dataType="string" defaultValue="ContextualTagBrowser"> <propertyValue value="SiteTagBrowser" resourceName="CF_SiteTagBrowser" /> <propertyValue value="ContextualTagBrowser" resourceName="CF_ContextualTagBrowser" /> <propertyValue value="Nothing" resourceName="CF_Nothing" /> </property> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: No tags have been created or used yet.
Minimum Number of Posts per Tag
Text to Display when No Tags are Available
If set to true, the tag cloud will not be filtered by tags identified in the URL. This can be useful if the tag cloud will be shown on a 'Tag Browser' page.
Only the most popular tags, up to the maximum number defined, will be displayed.
Only tags related to this minimum will be displayed.
A comma-separated list of tags to filter the tag cloud by.
If enabled, the number of posts referencing each tag will be shown with each tag.
Sorry, but there are no more tags available to filter with.

scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blog_CreateEditPost_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:

language.resource: Creates or edits a blog post.
Notify me when someone comments on this post
Post this entry on my other blogs
Are you sure you want to delete this post?
The title of your post is used to create the URL. If you want to use different keywords in the URL enter it below.
Your draft has been saved. To edit or publish it later, manage the blog and find the post in the posts list.
This image will be used as a thumbnail in blog post list view and as the image exposed to Open Graph.
Adjust the title used by search engines when referencing this content. If not set, the blog post’s name will be used. For best results custom titles should be 55 characters or less.
Comma-separated list of words that uniquely relate to this content. These can be used by search engines to improve search results.
character(s) over the recomended length. For best results this should shortened.

Post summaries are used when displaying posts in lists or RSS feeds. Additionally this summary is exposed to search engines and facebook. For best results, custom summaries should be 155 characters or less.
